Welcome to iTunes Link Maker. This simple web interface will automatically generate html you can copy-and-paste into your own code to create deep links to any music on the iTunes Store.  Simply enter a song name, album name, artist name, or any combination of the three to get started:

Country Search Media Type
           
 
Step 1: Enter the song, album, and/or artist to which you wish to link. Click "Search".
Step 2: Click the drill down arrow associated with a specific link on the page.
Step 3: Copy and paste the HTML link into your web page.
